医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
过早接触 YouTube 是否会导致孩子出现情绪和行为问题？ BMC Public Health 的一项研究表明，幼儿使用 YouTube 与情绪和行为问题有关，过早接触 YouTube 会增加出现这些问题的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Is-early-YouTube-exposure-causing-emotional-and-behavioral-issues-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Is-early-YouTube-exposure-causing-emotional-and-behavioral-issues-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1f30dd0-e627-4975-88cc-6c04dfb3a4ad Wed, 12 Jun 2024 22:25:00 -0400 Is early YouTube exposure causing emotional and behavioral issues in kids?
产前接种 COVID-19 疫苗对孕妇及其婴儿是安全的《妇产科》的一项研究发现，产前接种 COVID-19 疫苗不会增加不良妊娠结局的风险，证实了孕妇的疫苗安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Antenatal-COVID-19-vaccination-shown-to-be-safe-for-pregnant-women-and-their-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Antenatal-COVID-19-vaccination-shown-to-be-safe-for-pregnant-women-and-their-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e34c556-bd27-4e14-8218-f065e165bda8 Wed, 12 Jun 2024 21:12:00 -0400 Antenatal COVID-19 vaccination shown to be safe for pregnant women and their babies
无意中听到对话有助于采尔塔玛雅婴儿有效学习语言《美国国家科学院院刊》的一项研究表明，墨西哥南部土著社区的婴儿通过无意中听到的语言技能来发展，尽管看护者的直接讲话很少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Overhearing-conversations-helps-Tseltal-Maya-infants-learn-language- effectively.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Overhearing-conversations-helps-Tseltal-Maya-infants-learn-language- effectively.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83bfaf9b-3280-4ce8-9c36-7bf9501f7db8 Wed, 12 Jun 2024 20:09:00 -0400 Overhearing conversations helps Tseltal Maya infants learn language effectively
研究显示，胃绕道术可在 15 年内保持体重减轻和糖尿病缓解Roux-en-Y 胃绕道手术是一种减肥手术，在一项针对接受该手术的患者进行的最大长期研究中，Roux-en-Y 胃绕道手术可使 2 型糖尿病得到长达 15 年的缓解，并且在长达 20 年的时间内大部分体重减轻。步骤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Gastric-bypass-maintains-weight-loss-and-diabetes-remission-over-15-years-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Gastric-bypass-maintains-weight-loss-and-diabetes-remission-over-15-years-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd41e6f7-7026-423f-98cd-4f935265ed15 Wed, 12 Jun 2024 16:46:57 -0400 Gastric bypass maintains weight loss and diabetes remission over 15 years, study shows
“我努力保持坚强”：妈妈努力诊断儿子的发育问题四岁的艾哈迈尔·迪亚兹·桑顿（Ahmeir Diaz-Thornton）在课堂上坐不住，也很少吃午饭。虽然他的学前班同学能说出完美的句子，但艾哈迈尔却在发音上遇到了困难。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/e28098I-try-to-stay-stronge28099-Mom-struggles-to-get-diagnosis-for-sone28099s-developmental-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/e28098I-try-to-stay-stronge28099-Mom-struggles-to-get-diagnosis-for-sone28099s-developmental-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84aa5b2f-2748-4981-8865-727771d6f89a Wed, 12 Jun 2024 16:36:26 -0400 ‘I try to stay strong’: Mom struggles to get diagnosis for son’s developmental problems

Enterprise Therapeutics 发布了 ETD001 的临床前概况，这是一种新型吸入式 ENaC 阻滞剂Enterprise Therapeutics Ltd（Enterprise）是一家致力于发现和开发新疗法以改善呼吸系统疾病患者生活的生物制药公司，今天宣布在《囊性纤维化杂志》上发表一项同行评审研究1。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Enterprise-Therapeutics-publishes-preclinical-profile-of-ETD001-a-novel-inhaled-ENaC-blocker.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Enterprise-Therapeutics-publishes-preclinical-profile-of-ETD001-a-novel-inhaled-ENaC-blocker.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ee5629c-e11c-4083-9be1-fd735ada3e4e Wed, 12 Jun 2024 06:52:00 -0400 Enterprise Therapeutics publishes preclinical profile of ETD001, a novel inhaled ENaC blocker
